name: Assault on Area 51
description:
We were a group of 5 and it was out first game jam! It was a little overwhelming and the game may be a little rough on some places, but we are proud to have participated in the Kenney Jam 2019!

Your objective is to get to the end goal (reach area 51) while refueling the cars so they never run out of fuel and to get rid of the aliens with the help of your trusty gasoline-shooting gun.

This game fits the them of the Kenney Jam (Unlikely Combinations) because this game is a mix of platformer (jump on the cars), resource management (micromanaging the fuel) and action (shooting the aliens) . Also, because there are aliens in the desert with a touch of JoJo's and pixel art.

This game was made by a team of 5 for the Kenney Jam 2019.

Assets used in this game (all Kenney assets):

  1. Pixel vehicle pack https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-vehicle-pack
  2. Background elements pack https://kenney.nl/assets/background-elements
  3. Background elements redux pack https://kenney.nl/assets/background-elements-redux
  4. Particle pack https://kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack
  5. Alien UFO pack https://kenney.nl/assets/alien-ufo-pack
  6. Kenney Fonts pack https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
  7. On-Screen Controls pack https://kenney.nl/assets/onscreen-controls

The controls are the following:

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • E to interact (to refilll cars' fuel)
  • Acces the pause menu on the superior right corner

Help the raiders of Area 51 achieve their destiny!
